trans-unit.source: The class creates a default CCMapping between an EntityContainer in S space and an EntityContainer in C space.
trans-unit.target: 類別會在 S 空間中的 EntityContainer 和 C 空間中的 EntityContainer 之間建立預設的 CCMapping。

trans-unit.source: The Mapping will be created based on the declared types of extents.
trans-unit.target: 會依據範圍的宣告型別來建立對應。

trans-unit.source: So Inheritance does not work.
trans-unit.target: 因此繼承便無法運作。

trans-unit.source: No content here will be updated; please do not add material here.
trans-unit.target: 沒有要更新的內容，請不要在這裡新增資料。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Data.Entity.Design.EntityModelSchemaGenerator" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Data.Entity.Design.EntityModelSchemaGenerator" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: The storage model EntityContainer from which conceptual and mapping metadata is created.
trans-unit.target: 儲存體模型 EntityContainer，從其中建立概念和對應中繼資料。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Data.Entity.Design.EntityModelSchemaGenerator" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Data.Entity.Design.EntityModelSchemaGenerator" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: The storage model EntityContainer from which conceptual and mapping metadata is created.
trans-unit.target: 儲存體模型 EntityContainer，從其中建立概念和對應中繼資料。

trans-unit.source: The name for the conceptual model namespace.
trans-unit.target: 概念模型命名空間的名稱。

trans-unit.source: If this value is null, the storeEntityContainer name is used for the namespace name.
trans-unit.target: 如果此值為 null，就會使用 storeEntityContainer 名稱做為命名空間名稱。

trans-unit.source: The EntityContainer name declared in the conceptual model.
trans-unit.target: 概念模型中宣告的 EntityContainer 名稱。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Data.Entity.Design.EntityModelSchemaGenerator" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Data.Entity.Design.EntityModelSchemaGenerator" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: The StoreItemCollection that contains an EntityContainer and other items to create the Model Metadata from.
trans-unit.target: 包含要從其中建立模型中繼資料的 EntityContainer 及其他項目的 StoreItemCollection。

trans-unit.source: The name to give the namespace.
trans-unit.target: 要給予命名空間的名稱。

trans-unit.source: If null, the name of the storeEntityContainer will be used.
trans-unit.target: 如果是 null，就會使用 storeEntityContainer 的名稱。

trans-unit.source: The name to give the Model EntityContainer.
trans-unit.target: 提供給模型 EntityContainer 的名稱。

trans-unit.source: If null, a modified version of the namespace of the of a type referenced in storeEntityContainer will be used.
trans-unit.target: 如果是 null，則會使用 storeEntityContainer 中所參考型別之命名空間的修改版本。

trans-unit.source: Constructs an EntityModelGenerator
trans-unit.target: 建構 EntityModelGenerator

trans-unit.source: Gets the EdmItemCollection that was created by the GenerateMetadata method.
trans-unit.target: 取得 GenerateMetadata 方法建立的 EdmItemCollection。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Data.Metadata.Edm.EdmItemCollection" /> object that contains the conceptual schema definition language (CSDL).
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Data.Metadata.Edm.EdmItemCollection" /> 物件，包含概念結構描述定義語言 (CSDL)。

trans-unit.source: Gets the conceptual model EntityContainer that was created by the GenerateMetadata method.
trans-unit.target: 取得 GenerateMetadata 方法所建立的概念模型 EntityContainer。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Data.Metadata.Edm.EntityContainer" /> object that contains the conceptual model EntityContainer.
trans-unit.target: 包含概念模型 EntityContainer 的 <see cref="T:System.Data.Metadata.Edm.EntityContainer" /> 物件。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the flag for generating foreign key properties in a conceptual model.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定旗標，此旗標會用來在概念模型中產生外部索引鍵屬性。

trans-unit.source: If the value of this property is set to <see langword="true" /> then foreign key properties are generated in the conceptual model; otherwise foreign key properties are not generated in the conceptual model.
trans-unit.target: 如果此屬性的值設為 <see langword="true" />，則會在概念模型中產生外部索引鍵屬性，否則不會在概念模型中產生外部索引鍵屬性。

trans-unit.source: Generates the conceptual model metadata information and returns any schema errors.
trans-unit.target: 產生概念模型中繼資料資訊，並傳回所有結構描述錯誤。

trans-unit.source: Generates the conceptual model metadata information and returns any schema errors.
trans-unit.target: 產生概念模型中繼資料資訊，並傳回所有結構描述錯誤。

trans-unit.source: A collection of schema error objects.
trans-unit.target: 結構描述錯誤物件的集合。

trans-unit.source: The property of EntityFrameworkVersions that corresponds to the targeted version of the Entity Framework.
trans-unit.target: 對應至目標 Entity Framework 版本之 EntityFrameworkVersions 的屬性。

trans-unit.source: Generates the conceptual model metadata information and returns any schema errors.
trans-unit.target: 產生概念模型中繼資料資訊，並傳回所有結構描述錯誤。

trans-unit.source: A collection of schema error objects.
trans-unit.target: 結構描述錯誤物件的集合。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the PluralizationService value that indicates the service used when generating a model.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定 PluralizationService 值，指出產生模型時使用的服務。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Data.Entity.Design.PluralizationServices.PluralizationService" /> value that indicates the service used when generating a model.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Data.Entity.Design.PluralizationServices.PluralizationService" /> 值，表示產生模型時使用的服務。

trans-unit.source: Writes the generated conceptual schema definition language (CSDL) to the specified file.
trans-unit.target: 將產生的概念結構描述定義語言 (CSDL) 寫入至指定的檔案。

trans-unit.source: The name of the output file.
trans-unit.target: 輸出檔的名稱。

trans-unit.source: Writes the generated conceptual schema definition language (CSDL) to the specified file.
trans-unit.target: 將產生的概念結構描述定義語言 (CSDL) 寫入至指定的檔案。

trans-unit.source: The XmlWriter to which the CSDL is written.
trans-unit.target: XmlWriter，CSDL 會寫入至其中。

trans-unit.source: Writes the generated conceptual schema definition language (CSDL) to an XmlWriter object.
trans-unit.target: 將產生的概念結構描述定義語言 (CSDL) 寫入至 XmlWriter 物件。

trans-unit.source: Writes the generated mapping specification language (MSL) to the specified file.
trans-unit.target: 將產生的對應規格語言 (MSL) 寫入至指定的檔案。

trans-unit.source: The name of the output file.
trans-unit.target: 輸出檔的名稱。

trans-unit.source: Writes the generated mapping specification language (MSL) to the specified file.
trans-unit.target: 將產生的對應規格語言 (MSL) 寫入至指定的檔案。

trans-unit.source: The XmlWriter to which the MSL is written.
trans-unit.target: XmlWriter，MSL 會寫入至其中。

trans-unit.source: Writes the generated mapping specification language (MSL) to an XmlWriter object.
trans-unit.target: 將產生的對應規格語言 (MSL) 寫入至 XmlWriter 物件。
